item.title: Persistent illegal parking blocking access to service road, 27th December
item.description:
This is a persistent and ongoing problem. Vehicles are regularly parking in a way that blocks or severely restricts access to the rear access road serving several residential garages. Despite this being an access road, drivers continue to ignore the restriction, making it extremely difficult and at times impossible for residents to turn into or out of the access road when it is obstructed. Enfield Council does not appear to be enforcing the existing parking rules, and the situation has not improved over time. Clear road markings or painted lines are urgently needed to show exactly where parking is permitted and where it is not, as the lack of visual guidance is contributing to repeated illegal parking and ongoing access issues for residents

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pool abandoned in public area, 27th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kidbrooke Park Close, Kidbrooke

item.title: Repeat dog mess on pavement, 27th December
item.description:
I am getting fed up of the constant dog fouling on the pavement on Pickford Lane. Huge piles almost daily! Across the road from the butchers it is everywhere. When is something going to be done about putting a stop to it? It is obviously the same person!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Pickford Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
